name: Moonshot (itch) (Diego Escalante)
description:
Description: A short narrative game about a falling moon, and the beings that must cope with it.

Jam Details: This game was made in 2 days for the Ludum Dare 50 Compo in April of 2022. The theme of the jam was "Delay the Inevitable."
